name: UDrink - Smart Water Bottle
description: An ecosystem that seamlessly integrates a smart water bottle equipped with multiple sensors, enabling effortless monitoring of water intake and daily consumption via Wi-Fi. The app provides valuable insights and detailed analysis of hydration habits, helping you stay on top of your water consumption goals.

name: EduCraft - AI Quiz Builder
description: A webapp designed to transform educational assessment. Leveraging the OpenAI API, the platform seamlessly parses content from PDFs, PPTX files, or plain text, generating tailored quizzes instantly to the user's specifications.

name: Personal Website V2
description: Updated personal portfolio website from vanilla JavaScript to React.js, highlighting my top projects and past work experiences.

name: Boba Store Website
description: This was built for CSCE 331 as an improved website for ShareTea. This website allows customers and employees to place orders through an intuitive and accessibility friendly interface. Employees can check current stock of ingredients and adjust prices for menu items. Trends can also be viewed by the manager displaying order statistics such as popular combinations of boba drinks, sales reports, and more.

name: Smart Mirror
description: Voice-controlled smart mirror, built using a Raspberry Pi and multiple sensors, displaying the time, date, and weather, with user-proximity-based adjustable accent lighting.

name: Point of Sale Application
description: A point of sale application that enables employees to manage customer orders, update menu prices, track inventory stock, add new items, and allows managers to access business statistics.

name: Personal Website V1.5
description: Portfolio built for CSCE 315 using two different website styles.

name: Reservation Slack Bot
description: A Slack bot for Hewlett Packard Enterprise's ClustorStor team, streamlining storage device reservation and statistics viewing for over +10 engineers, using Python, Slack API, and an internal inventory database.

name: Aggie Linux Shell
description: Custom UNIX shell, made using C++ . Is capable of running basic shell commmands (cd,ls,cat,etc), piping commands, creating background processes, and more. Allows for customizable prompt.

name: Personal Website V1
description: First portfolio website built using vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

name: Mental Health Tracker
description: Website enabling users to log their mood through a selection of 5 emoticons (happy to sad), tracking trends in their selections. This project won Tamuhack 2022's Best Hack for Social Good.

name: NAE Solar Calculator
description: A MATLAB application that recommends solar farm sizes based on house square footage, compares solar panel costs, and estimates time to offset expenses using public databases.
